main event: Three patrolmen observed a bright light in the eastern sky while on duty in New Rochelle, New York.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for several minutes,The object was reported to move slowly from east to south,The object was at an approximate altitude of 1,000 feet,No discernible features or sound were associated with the object,The officer concluded it may have been the star Sirius due to visibility in the area.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
